short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows latest price of ARK/BTC for bittrex.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ARK (ark.io) is not just a cryptocurrency - it is also an eco-system meant for cryptocurrency mass adoption. (more at ark.io)

Extension Features: 
1. ARK price in BTC
2. Notify you When Price +-
3. Control refresh time ( 1-min by default)
